The PsychGen Centre is an interdisciplinary research environment dedicated to advancing knowledge about mental health.

To learn more about the PsychGen center, you can visit its [NIPH website](https://www.fhi.no/en/me/the-psychgen-centre-for-genetic-epidemiology-and-mental-health/).
